price: Wancan sababinsa, lalle (shi ne) idan an kirãyi Allah Shi kaɗai, sai ku kãfirta, kuma idan aka yi shirki game da Shi, sai ku yi ĩmãni. To, hukuncin fa, na Allah Maɗaukaki, Mai girma ne.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّهُۥٓ إِذَا دُعِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَحۡدَهُۥ كَفَرۡتُمۡ وَإِن يُشۡرَكۡ بِهِۦ تُؤۡمِنُواْۚ فَٱلۡحُكۡمُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡعَلِيِّ ٱلۡكَبِيرِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
